text: Thomas Leslie Gray (9 April 1946 â€“ 21 February 2004), known more commonly as Les Gray, was an English musician best known for his work with glam rock pop band Mud. Mud are best known for their song "Tiger Feet". He died on the 21st of February 2004 at the age of 57. Category:English musicians Category:1946 births Category:2004 deaths
title: Les Gray
